data.title: Front Mount Hitch Installation CURT 31302 on GMC Sierra 1500
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, Trailer Hitch, how to install, front mount trailer hitch, towing
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 31302 front mount trailer hitch on a 2005 GMC Sierra 1500.

Install Sheet - 
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/31302/installsheet/CM_31302_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2008 - 2013 Chevy Silverado 1500
2009 - 2013 GMC Sierra 1500
2007 - GMC Sierra 1500 New Body 
1999 - 2006 Chevy Silverado 1500/2500 LD Except SS
1999 - 2006 GMC Sierra 1500/2500LD, Except SS

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: Gooseneck Hitch Install: CURT 60648 with 60619 on Silverado 2500 HD
data.tags: CURT Gooseneck Hitch, Chevy Silverado, Receiver hitch, towing hitch, how to install
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 60648 underbed install kit with the CURT 60619 doublelock EZr gooseneck hitch on a 2007 Chevy Silverado 2500 quad cab with a short bed.

Install Sheet:
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/60648/installsheet/CM_60648_INS.PDF
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/60607/installsheet/CM_606https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/60619/installsheet/CM_60619_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2001-2010 Silverado/Sierra 2500/3500

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
Do not install mounting rails over plastic bed liners. Plastic bed liners must be cut out of the way to provide metal to metal contact. Base rails may be installed on spray in liners.

Only use provided hardware.
Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: Trailer Hitch Install: CURT 16022 RAM OEM 5th Wheel Roller Adapter
data.tags: CURT Trailer hitch, 5th wheel roller adapter, how to install, Dodge Ram
data.description:
This video depicts the assembly and installation of the CURT 16022 Ram OEM 5th Wheel Roller Adapter, in combination with the 16570 R24 5th Wheel Roller and the 16545 Q24 5th Wheel Hitch Head.  The 16022 is compatible with the following roller models: 16550, 16560, 16570.

Install Sheet - https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/16022/installsheet/CM_16022_INS.PDF

Features:

- Adapts any CURT 5th Wheel Roller to fit RAM OEM under-bed hitch platform.

- Quarter-Turn Anchoring System provides quick installation and removal.

- Adjustable anchors to eliminate chucking between the legs and under-bed rails.

- Meets or exceeds current and proposed industry standards.

- Protected by a highly durable carbide powder coat finish.

- Backed by a 10-year limited warranty.


Read and understand instructions before using this product. Fully instruct and demonstrate the operation of this 5th wheel hitch to the end user. Include the importance of observing all warnings contained herein, including warning labels on 5th wheel hitch mid section. Provide this manual in its entirety to the end-user. Serious injury or death may result if the warnings above are not observed.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.

data.title: Trailer Wiring Install: CURT 56160 on Lincoln MKX
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, Trailer hitch, wiring, how to install, trailer wiring, Lincoln MKX, Ford Escape, Ford Edge, Mercury Mariner
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 56160 custom vehicle-to-trailer wiring harness on the 2008 Lincoln MKX. You must read and understand the supplied instruction sheet(s) prior to installing. 

**This particular installation shows an alternative method for installing the CURT 56160. This video is specifically made for the Lincoln MKX. Please refer to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nj7jMgcgzGk for additional installation techniques.**

2007 - 2010 Lincoln MKX
2007 - 2010 Ford Edge (excluding EcoBoost models)
2008 - 2012 Ford Escape (excluding Hybrid models)
2004 - 2007 Ford Freestar Van
2005 - 2011 Mercury Mariner
2008 - 2011 Mazda Tribute

data.title: Trailer Hitch Install: CURT 12272 on a Chevy Malibu
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, Trailer Hitch, how to install, Chevy Malibu, towing
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 12272 class 2 trailer hitch on a 2006 Chevy Malibu. 

Install Sheet - 
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/122720/installsheet/CM_122720_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2004-2007 Chevy Malibu 

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
-Need help or have some questions? Call Technical Support at 800.798.0813 (Monday-Friday 8am-7pm CST)

data.title: Trailer Wiring Install: CURT 56013 on a Chevy Malibu
data.tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, Trailer hitch, wiring, how to install, Chevy Malibu, Pontiac G6, trailer wiring
data.description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 56013 Taillight Converter on a 2006 Chevy Malibu. You must read and understand the supplied instruction sheet(s) prior to installing. 

https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/56013/installsheet/CME_56013_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:

2005-2009 Pontiac G6 (coupe and sedan models) 
2004-2007 Chevy Malibu 
2004-2007 Malibu Maxx (all, except SS)

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
